description: There's nothing Phoenix wouldn't do for her best friend, Darling. They grew up on the same block, braid each other's hair and tell each other everything, or so Phoenix thought. One day Phoenix catches Darling sneaking out of the house, leaving behind only a necklace with 'Queen of Hearts' engraved on it as a clue. Not wanting to give Darling away, she covers for her until she can get to the bottom of it. And in her innocence, Phoenix waltzes right into the brothel looking for her friend. The working ladies aren't amused, but the Madame, Princess Donna, sees a business opportunity when she has one and this young, sexy blonde fell into her lap. Donna agrees to show this newbie the ropes with three of the brothel's regulars. This is no easy initiation into the world of whores; and Donna takes it as hard as she expects Phoenix too, with deep-throating, rim jobs, dirty ass to mouth cock sucking, fisting, double penetration, flogging, choking and heavy man-handling of the pretty lil' blonde. Donna and Phoenix get fucked at the same time, and when the boys cum inside and on Phoenix Marie, anal cream pie! Our lovely Madame is there to lick it all off.
title: Queen of Hearts: Part 2. The Corruption of Phoenix Marie.
